publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3886 David Whitton: Satellite GP Service for Twecharâ€”That the Parliament congratulates East Dunbartonshire Community Health Partnership for reaching the decision to allow a satellite GP service to serve the village of Twechar in East Dunbartonshire for a six-month trial period; notes the efforts of the Twechar Community Action group, which has been seeking GP provision for the village for several years, and wishes Rochdale GP practice in Kirkintilloch, which will be providing the service, every success in the village. Supported by: Pauline McNeill*, Ross Finnie*, Stuart McMillan*, Des McNulty*, Trish Godman*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-3886 Satellite GP Service for Twechar (lodged on 7 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3886 Satellite GP Service for Twechar (lodged on 7 April 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3886 Satellite GP Service for Twechar (lodged on 7 April 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-3886 Satellite GP Service for Twechar (lodged on 7 April 2009) Sarah Boyack*
